sentences: Tema lõi värava kolm minuti pärast algust.
context: The word 'lõid' is the past tense (perfect) of the Estonian verb 'lööma', which means 'to hit' or 'to strike'. It can also be used in the sense of creating or making something, similar to English 'to make'. In these examples, it shows hitting/striking physical objects and also the metaphorical use of establishing relationships.
